title: Nicole Scherzinger Low-Key SLAMS Those Harry Styles Rumours - Yahoo Celebrity UK
text:
You may recall - oh, what, several hours ago - when this mad old story broke, about tousled sex pot Harry Styles getting it on with none other than Greek yoghurt enthusiast Nicole Scherzinger. 
What a whirlwind those hours have been, ladies and gents. 
Love’s young dream? ERM, NOPE. Copyright: [Rex] 
Anyway, whilst the rest of us recoiled away from our computer screens in abject horror and disbelief, Scherzy took to Twitter to sort these pesky rumours out once and for all. 
But like, kind of on the sly. 
Just so we’re all on the same page, yesterday The Sun published an article where it alleged that Nicole and Harry got it on back when Harry was 19 and Nics was on (another) break from Lewis Hamilton. They were said to be “wildly flirting” and “all over each other” at a Brits party - with a ‘source’ close to Nicole apparently admitting that she and Harry shared a kiss and got on well yet“never dated” - but met up early last year again. 
Clearly they can’t keep their hands off each other…. Copyright: [Rex] 
Well, it seems Nicole has some ‘thoughts’ on this. After Twitter user @ StylesforStiles tweeted The Sun’s head of showbiz saying: ‘how do you still have a job when all you do is write garbage everyday’ (Oh, the shade of it all), Nicole went ahead and FAVED the tweet, which pretty much says everything we need to know about The Scherzinger’s thoughts on it all. 
No word on whether or not another Sherzy’s going to do another ‘comedy’ video similar to the one she did about the whole Ed Sheeran fiasco a few months back, but we can all live in hope, eh folks. Reblog
